title: Bombastic
desc:
Post 1398
- Choose a player and a card from both of your hands
- All cards in both players' hands change to those cards
- Ex: Player 1 has 1 2 3 4 red and chooses Player 2 who has 1 2 3 4 yellow
 - Player 1 chooses 1 yellow and 1 red, cards change and players swap
 - Player 1 now has 1 1 1 1 yellow and Player 2 has 1 1 1 1 red
